info.title: odmObject sensor.water

sensor.water.description:
This odmObject describes whether water has been sensed or not.
The Property "value" is a boolean.
A value of 'true' means that water has been sensed.
A value of 'false' means that water not been sensed.
sensor.water.name: sensor water

value.description: The water sensor, true = sensed, false = not sensed.
value.name: value
